ğŸŒ WorldTiles.name: Sun
ğŸŒ WorldTiles.scene_description: A bright, stylized sun rising in the corner of the scene, casting a warm yellow light. Unlocked by 'Hello', it signifies the start of a new day.

ğŸŒ WorldTiles.name: Thank You Flower
ğŸŒ WorldTiles.scene_description: A single, beautiful flower that blooms when placed. Unlocked by 'Thank you', it's a visual representation of a kind gesture.

ğŸŒ WorldTiles.name: Student at Desk
ğŸŒ WorldTiles.scene_description: An isometric student character sitting at a simple wooden desk, reading a book. Unlocked by 'I am a student'.

ğŸŒ WorldTiles.name: Waving Hand
ğŸŒ WorldTiles.scene_description: A stylized, animated hand that waves goodbye. Unlocked by 'Goodbye'.

ğŸ” DiscoveryPatterns.combined_scene_description: Sun rising over a path creates a perfect morning scene.
A student waving suggests a greeting to a respected figure like a teacher.
A nameplate followed by a portrait visually connects a name to a person.
Questioning a scene with friends prompts thoughts about relationships.
A collection of numbered items around a student implies counting.
Lining up countable items like books and apples reinforces the concept of counting.
Placing a father and daughter figure together highlights their direct relationship.
Placing a mother and son figure together shows their connection.
Grouping electronic devices like a computer and TV suggests a modern living space.
A table, chair, and cup form a complete dining or cafe setting.
Pairing two items of different primary colors emphasizes the concept of color itself.
Combining a new jacket and a beautiful dress suggests a fresh, new outfit.
A calendar and a clock together represent the passage of time, from days to hours.
The sun (morning), a clock (noon), and a movie ticket (afternoon) show different parts of the day.
Grouping various city buildings and signs creates a bustling urban environment.
Vehicles moving in a line suggest travel and direction, like front and back.
A bowl of rice next to a basket of vegetables represents a complete, balanced meal.
Placing water and a teapot together highlights different types of common drinks.
Combining icons of happiness and beauty evokes strong positive emotions.
The contrast between a snowflake (cold) and the sun (hot) clearly illustrates opposite temperatures.
